message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-end product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm looking for $25000 for it. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not quite comfortable with the $18000 price point. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $22000. Would that work for you?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $19500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're still looking to negotiate, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $21000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $19000. Would you be willing to meet me at $19000?

I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $19000, but I need to make a bit more than that to make it worth my while. I can offer it to you for $19500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $19500, but I'm still a bit below that. Would you be willing to meet me at $19000?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $19500, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again at $19250. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $19250, but I'm still a bit above that. Would you be willing to meet me at $18500?
